A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
THIS IS STARWARS


Possibly the best Star Wars movie yet. With amazing characters and an even better plot\, Rian Johnson outdid himself with this movie. From the flight scene in the beginning\, to the death of Luke Skywalker\, this movie is stand alone excellence\, yet still mirrors all three movies from the original. This movie is too amazing for those who criticize it to truly understand what it means to be a fan of the greatest franchise in the galaxy. Can not wait for Solo or Episode IX
